kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Create Directory
kw.doc: Creates the specified directory.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Variable Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails unless the given variable exists within the current scope.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get Browser Metadata
kw.doc: Fetches browser metadata information :param browser: Name of the browser for which information is fetched :param reload: Re-read the metadata based on the browser :return: Browser metadata information, dict of format {"browser_version": browser version value, "driver_version": driver version value}

kw.name: Set Suite Metadata
kw.doc: Sets metadata for the current test suite.

kw.name: Set Suite Metadata
kw.doc: Sets metadata for the current test suite.

kw.name: Set Suite Metadata
kw.doc: Sets metadata for the current test suite.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Get Environment Variable
kw.doc: Returns the value of an environment variable with the given name.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return If
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and returns from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.msg: Returning from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Variable Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails unless the given variable exists within the current scope.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Chrome Options for download preferences
Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Return From Keyword If
kw.doc: Returns from the enclosing user keyword if ``condition`` is true.
kw.msg: Returning from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Set Suite Metadata
kw.doc: Sets metadata for the current test suite.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Connect To Session
kw.doc: Connects to an open session SAP.

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a connection to the given connection name. Be sure to provide the full connection name, including the bracket part.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Inserts the given text into the text field identified by locator. Use keyword `input password` to insert a password in a text field.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Inserts the given text into the text field identified by locator. Use keyword `input password` to insert a password in a text field.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Inserts the given password into the text field identified by locator. The password is not recorded in the log.

kw.name: Send Vkey
kw.doc: Sends a SAP virtual key combination to the window, not into an element. If you want to send a value to a text field, use `input text` instead.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Transaction
kw.doc: Runs a Sap transaction. An error is given when an unknown transaction is specified.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Caret Position
kw.doc: clicks at the caret position within a label is possible even though it is not visualized as a caret by SAP GUI. The position of the caret within a text field may be checked by the ABAP application to determine which word the caret is in.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Performs a single click on a given element. Used only for buttons, tabs and menu items.
